title: What are the best ADC's right now?
body: I play ADC a lot (of course in ranked I end up with support 75% of the time) and have been doing quite well but I really want to play more than just Sivir and Ez, I want to have something for every occasion. So if I get the opportunity to counter pick I am able to. But I want to know what you think are the strongest ADC's right now. You don't have to play bot lane to answer this question. Just list the ADC's that you think come out strong in your games. Thanks :)

replies.body: I see lucian as the best alround ADC right now.
Caitlyn is meh, and only has range as her "high point" and it's a rather mediocre one.

Lucian and Ezreal are the main ones, Sivir can be up there simply because sivir.

Outside of that trio, you mainly have to pick for survivability, and no other ADC's really offer that.

As a glass cannon with no way out, Kog can work extremely well if you can farm and get to the 3 item spike.

I would say lucian and jhin.
new miss fortune korean build is pretty good too
Lucian jinx and vayne if they are built right
Jhin's also good if you can play him.
